mapper.select:
select count(ridingNo) as cnt from ridingBoard
where ${searchKey} like '%${searchWord}%'
mapper.insert: insert into ridingBoard(nickname, ridingSubject, ridingContent, startDate, endDate, maxUser, applyUser, courseLevel, ridingKeyword) values(#{nickname}, #{ridingSubject}, #{ridingContent}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{maxUser}, 0 ,#{courseLevel}, #{ridingKeyword})
mapper.update: update ridingBoard set ridingHit = ridingHit+1 where ridingNo=#{param1}
mapper.select: select ridingNo, nickname, ridingSubject, ridingKeyword, DATE_FORMAT(startDate, '%Y-%m-%d') AS startDate , DATE_FORMAT(endDate,'%Y-%m-%d') as endDate, courseLevel, maxUser, applyUser, ridingContent, ridingHit, ridingWriteDate from ridingBoard where ridingNo=#{param1}
mapper.delete: delete from ridingBoard where ridingNo=#{param1} and nickname=#{param2}
mapper.update: UPDATE ridingMember rm JOIN member m ON rm.nickname = m.nickName SET rm.gender = m.gender WHERE rm.nickname = m.nickname;
mapper.select: select ridingMemberNo, nickname, gender, ridingCount, userScore from ridingMember where ridingNo=#{ridingNo}
mapper.delete: delete from ridingMember where ridingNo=#{ridingNo} and nickname=#{nickname}
